Package com.droidcare.boundary

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptedAppointmentList
    This class is a list fragment subclass which holds and shows all appointments with the "Accepted" status.
    AppointmentDetailsActivity
    Displays the appointment details.
    CreateAppointmentActivity
    Display user interface for creating a new appointment.
    DatePickerFragment
    Defines the date picker fragment.
    EditAppointmentActivity
    Display user interface for modifying a pending appointment.
    EditProfileActivity
    Activity handling edit profile.
    FinishedAppointmentList
    This class is a list fragment subclass which holds and shows all appointments with the "Accepted" status.
    ForgetPasswordActivity
    Activity handling forget password
    HomeActivity
    Main Activity after the user has logged in.
    LoginActivity
    Activity handling login.
    PendingAppointmentList
    This class is a list fragment subclass which holds and shows all appointments with the "Pending" status.
    RegisterActivity
    Activity handling user registration.
    RejectedAppointmentList
    This class is a list fragment subclass which holds and shows all appointments with the "Rejected" status.
    TitleActivity
    Activity which is shown when the user opens the application.
